title: Student Gradebook
description: Create a program that uses a dictionary to store student names as keys and their corresponding grades as values. The program should allow users to add, remove, and update student grades. It should also be able to calculate the average grade of all students and display the grades of a specific student.
sample_input: add John 90, add Jane 85, remove John, update Jane 95, average, display Jane
sample_output: John added with grade 90, Jane added with grade 85, John removed, Jane's grade updated to 95, Average grade: 95.0, Jane's grade: 95
